text: Shashi Kapoor (Balbir Raj Prithviraj Kapoor; 18 March 1938 in Calcutta - 4 December 2017 in Mumbai) was an Indian movie actor and movie producer. He was known for his roles in Junoon, Kabhie Kabhie, Deewaar, Siddhartha, and in Ajooba. Kapoor died in a hospital in Mumbai of cirrhosis on 4 December 2017 at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Non Resident Indian magazine profile of Shashi Kapoor Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from cirrhosis Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian movie producers Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian child actors
title: Shashi Kapoor
